document.title: Business Application Form Structure
document.description: A comprehensive form structure designed to help the business achieve its goals of collecting user feedback, qualifying leads, and automating onboarding processes.

explanation: The form structure consists of a root form that serves as the central hub, linking to three subforms: a feedback form, a lead qualification form, and an onboarding form. The root form contains relation fields to connect to each subform. Each subform is designed to address a specific business goal, ensuring a logical and efficient data collection process. This structure ensures all data flows from the root form to the subforms, adhering to the specified requirements.

forms.name: root_form
forms.title: Main Business Form
forms.description: The central form connecting to all subforms for feedback, lead qualification, and onboarding.

fields.name: business_name
fields.title: Business Name
fields.description: Enter the name of your business.

fields.name: contact_email
fields.title: Contact Email
fields.description: Provide the primary email address for your business.

fields.name: contact_phone
fields.title: Contact Phone
fields.description: Provide the primary phone number for your business.

fields.name: website_url
fields.title: Website URL
fields.description: Provide the URL of your business website.

fields.name: industry
fields.title: Industry
fields.description: Select the industry your business operates in.

fields.name: feedback_form_relation
fields.title: Feedback Form
fields.description: Link to the feedback form for collecting user feedback.

fields.name: lead_qualification_form_relation
fields.title: Lead Qualification Form
fields.description: Link to the lead qualification form for qualifying leads.

fields.name: onboarding_form_relation
fields.title: Onboarding Form
fields.description: Link to the onboarding form for automating the onboarding process.

forms.name: feedback_form
forms.title: User Feedback Form
forms.description: Form to collect feedback from users about new product features.

fields.name: user_name
fields.title: User Name
fields.description: Enter your name.

fields.name: email
fields.title: Email Address
fields.description: Provide your email address.

fields.name: feedback
fields.title: Feedback
fields.description: Share your feedback about the new product features.

fields.name: rating
fields.title: Rating
fields.description: Rate the new product features on a scale of 1 to 5.

forms.name: lead_qualification_form
forms.title: Lead Qualification Form
forms.description: Form to qualify leads through a conversational approach.

fields.name: lead_name

fields.description: Enter the name of the lead.

fields.description: Enter the name of the lead's company.

fields.name: email
fields.title: Email Address
fields.description: Provide the lead's email address.

fields.title: Interest Level
fields.description: Select the lead's level of interest.

forms.name: onboarding_form
forms.title: Onboarding Form
forms.description: Form to automate the onboarding process for new users.

fields.name: user_name
fields.title: User Name
fields.description: Enter your name.

fields.name: email
fields.title: Email Address
fields.description: Provide your email address.
